thread.title: College events nixed from schedule with weather concerns
thread.title_full: College events nixed from schedule with weather concerns

title: College events nixed from schedule with weather concerns
text: Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 12:18 AM Updated at 12:19 AM Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 12:18 AM Updated at 12:19 AM ELON — A pair of Colonial Athletic Association soccer games scheduled for Elon’s Rudd Field have been postponed because of weather concerns. Tonight’s women’s game against William & Mary and Saturday night’s men’s game against Northeastern have been called off. Make-up dates are pending. ■ In men’s tennis , the Elon Fall Invitational has been cancelled. It was slated for today through Sunday. ■ In men’s golf at Chapel Hill, the 14-team Tar Heel Intercollegiate has been cancelled. The event, with North Carolina as host, was scheduled for Saturday and Sunday at Finley Golf Coruse. Elon was among the would-be participants. The Times-News Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 12:18 AM Updated at 12:19 AM
